title: Refactor Magic Numbers to Configuration
description: The hello_world.py file contains hardcoded values for screen size, step_size (speed), frame rate (1/60, 1/12), and animation duration. Move these to a constant configuration block or class to improve maintainability.

title: Add Sprint Mechanic for Mouse
description: Add a sprint ability for the Mouse (e.g., holding SHIFT) that increases speed temporarily. Implement a stamina bar or cooldown system to prevent abuse.

title: Add Unit Tests for Movement Logic
description: Currently, verification is manual. Extract the vector math (distance calculation, normalization) and movement logic (keyboard vs chase behavior) into pure functions and add unit tests using unittest or pytest.

title: Implement Inertia/Steering for Kitten AI
description: The Kitten currently turns instantly. Implement a steering behavior (Reynolds steering) or simple inertia so the Kitten has a turning radius, allowing the Mouse to outmaneuver it.

title: Implement Asset Restoration Script
description: Large binary assets (ambience.wav, mouse_sheet.png) are currently ignored in VCS. Create a script (e.g., 'download_assets.py' or 'generate_assets.py') to restore them for fresh clones. This ensures the app is portable.

title: Add Reaction Delay to Kitten AI
description: The Kitten currently tracks the Mouse perfectly every frame. Add a reaction delay or 'simulated perception' so the Kitten updates its target position less frequently or with a lag.
